about_the_game:
After a fatal car accident,
you are rebirthed in another world as a Savior.

With the help of your Nun servant,
you'll travel around while saving the empire from various threats.

Although you're still weak from rebirth,
you can increase your power by having sex with women.

Develop relationships with many different girls,
and eventually create your harem.


Don't neglet your harem too much though!
Somone is waiting to act on your negligence.
(Can be disabled in the options if you don't want NTR.)

Base HCG 96
Total HCG 875
(Includes a gallery system, which can unlock all scenes immediately)

Press "Q" to open player menu,
which contains the skill tree/gallery.

Press "W" to open partner menu,
to interact with and give commands to the Nun.

Features included in this game
*Many sexy female characters that can have sex with, also having a harem ending.
*Lots of fertilization and pregnancy content
*Plenty of side stories and erotic scenes to play.
*Defeat and conquer monster girls.
*NTL and NTR content. (NTR can be turned off manually)

content_descriptors.notes:
All characters in this game are adults, and anyone under the age of 18 is prohibited from playing this game.

This game contains a lot of pornographic and sexual content. 
Such as sex, non-consensual sex, pregnancy, cheating sex, role-playing sex.

detailed_description:
After a fatal car accident,
you are rebirthed in another world as a Savior.

With the help of your Nun servant,
you'll travel around while saving the empire from various threats.

Although you're still weak from rebirth,
you can increase your power by having sex with women.

Develop relationships with many different girls,
and eventually create your harem.


Don't neglet your harem too much though!

(Can be disabled in the options if you don't want NTR.)

Base HCG 96
Total HCG 875
(Includes a gallery system, which can unlock all scenes immediately)

Press "Q" to open player menu,
which contains the skill tree/gallery.

Press "W" to open partner menu,
to interact with and give commands to the Nun.

Features included in this game

name: 種付勇者傳

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: 2.5+ GHz processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Not an integrated video card; DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x720 Minimum screen resolution.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: 3+ GHz processor
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Not an integrated video card; DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

csrr.descriptors: 本遊戲含有大量色情與性愛內容, 所有角色結為成年
